objects.text: GIVA Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs

925 Sterling Silver • Rose Gold Plated
Certificate of Authenticity • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner design features a luxurious and elegant theme perfect for high-end jewelry promotion. The background uses a soft radial gradient with subtle circular and linear graphic accents in pinks and rose hues. At the top center is the **"heading"** text layer styled with a classic serif font, exuding sophistication. Directly beneath is the **"subheading"**, a bold sans-serif font offering a modern contrast and high readability.

Centrally placed is the **"product_image"**, which dominates the layout and showcases a pair of stud earrings, emphasizing the product visually. Below it lies the **"description"** text, providing material and warranty details in an evenly spaced serif font. The **"price"** text layer is just below in large, bold type to grab attention.

At the bottom center is a rectangular **"cta_background"** with rounded corners and a white **"cta"** text over it, encouraging immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Dusty Rose: `#F4C2C9`
- Rosewood: `#8E3A47`
- Garnet Pink: `#A64253`
- Crystal White: `#FFFFFF`
- Blush Pink: `#FBE6E9`

This layout balances luxurious visual elements with clear product information and a strong call-to-action.
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant earrings with a romantic and feminine color palette dominated by soft rose gold (#F4A6A6), diamond white (#FFFFFF), and crystal clear accents (#E5E5E5). The rose gold forms the base structure, softly blending with the teardrop-shaped pink stones that add a subtle glow (#FBBBC3). Crystal-like white stones accentuate the design, catching light beautifully and creating sparkle. The metal detailing seamlessly transitions between the blush tones and the brilliance of the gems, maintaining visual harmony. These colors suggest sophistication and luxury, and are ideal for a banner background using soft blush or light neutrals for contrast.
